content.detailedDescription: While driving on i-40 going towards hickory,n.C. about 5 miles east of statesville, n.C. we witness two jets flying with contrails, clear blue skys, no occlusions. a large comtrail came down out the the sky between the other two comtrails and suddenly presented a large shaped disk, very bright glowing and reflective. white to metal looking object. it was there approximately 6-8 seconds, then retracted back into the sky taking with it the comtrail that it produced. like it was never there.  approximately 30 minutes prior we witnessed two small objects in front of our vehicle flying on both sides in apporimately same level of skyline and same discription of the larger disk object, but they were much smaller.
content.summary: Witnessed by myself and husband large shaped disked object between two moving jet airplanes with contrails.

content.detailedDescription: I just got home from work and was sitting outside with my dog. i noticed an object in the sky, but thought it was an airplane or helicopter. i looked in the same direction a few seconds later and noticed it was in the same spot. i kept looking at it as it hovered and reflected light, so i ran in my house to get my camera,(but forgot my glasses which i need for seeing objects upclose, thats why in the video i am going in and out of focus). i filmed it for about one minute, if you freeze frame certain parts you can see it. my feelings during all this was that of excitement.
content.summary: I witnessed a  hovering stationary object.

content.detailedDescription:
I just turned off of u.S.24 and got on u.S.31
the lights hovered, and then went right for about 5 seconds then it stopped for 2 or 3 seconds, and then went straight up until it disappeared. it was a clear night and you could see the stars. believe me when i tell you it was not after burners, and it wasnt chaff flairs. i grew up on gris. air base. my dad was stationed there. nothing could move that fast and the disappear. the closer i got to where i first seen it my radio buzzed out for a second. this is real. please dont dismiss it.
content.summary: Light shot acrossed u.S.31 and u.S 24

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving north on an interstate highway located just east and roughly parallel to the lower part of the nj turnpike.  it was a day or two before christmas, 1974, around 12-1 am in the morning.  i had the entire road to myself, it seemed, as no other carlights were in sight in either direction.  i may have been a half hour or so into new jersey from the delaware bridge.  i was in the left lane when whatever it was ran up from my left and out from the sizable median separating us northbounders from the southbound lanes.  the median sloped down out of sight, and so there was no warning of its heading my way and i didnt see it until it was on the road.  it almost immediately stopped, while in the left-most lane, right in front of me, as it spotted my car approaching.  it quickly stopped, faced me, and stood erect, acting like a deer frozen for a moment in the headlights.  the expression on its face seemed one of shock, like what was i doing there?  i reciprocated, but was busy trying to slow down without losing control.  i had a good look at it, perhaps for 2-3 seconds, before it turned in the direction from whence it had come, and scampered off back into the median -- down, out of sight once again.
    it seemed thinner and more gangly than a human, possible taller, but it may have only seemed tall due to its relative thinness coupled with the relatively long arms and legs compared to its torso.  it had no clothes; its entire body was a uniform dull white, or perhaps a light shade of gray.  the head was hairless and thin as well -- not like any human head ive ever seen.  though it faced me and was naked, i recall no other physical features.  it seemed quite surprised to see me, judging by the expression of its eyes and mouth, as if it were a wild animal entering a road for the first time.
    i had a passenger, a priest, bumming a ride to nyc, lying down in the back seat, sleeping.  i was heading home to ny from college for winter break.  it seemed so surreal after it happened that i only shared the experience with my wife, already in ny, the next day, and pretty much forgot about it, as i regarded it as an oddity that would remain unexplained.  it wasnt until a few years ago that i read about greys, etc.  i now suspect thats what it was.
content.summary: Spindly, naked, white/gray humanoid, but definitely not human, ran in front of my car.

content.detailedDescription:
It would have been 11:10-11:15 am i just pulled out of the parking lot of work going west on hwy 70 in longview nc to lunch at amos howard's restaurant.

i noticed what i thought was an airplane flying low just above the high tension power lines. (150-200 feet high the object) the object was moving right to left.

i first thought the object was an airplane coming from the nearby hickory airport. i did wonder why it was so low and that caught my attention. the object was oblong, oval maybe 100 feet long and bulged in the middle to maybe 30-40 feet at the center. the sun was behind me and glaring off the craft and i thought at first that the sun's glare was hiding the wings. the object was whitish in color but seemed to reflect the sun like metal. i watched it move just over the road i was on i am not sure how far it was ahead of me not more than 1/4 mile. it then turned and this is when it got interesting. it did not turn the way an airplane turns it pivoted around it's midsection. it got right over the center of the highway then rotated until it was in line with the road. the object was oval from the side but as it turned i could see it was like a sub bun and looked circular from behind. it had no wings at all i could see this clearly now. the back of the craft was the same white metal color but in the center rear of the craft was a black featureless circle. the craft began traveling along above the road slowly at first then all of a sudden it shrank to a black dot and then disappeared as if it shot forward at an impossible speed.
content.summary: An oval shaped object that was white movd over road turned away from me and moved off  at great rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: This happened many years ago but is still fairly vivid in my mind and is the only time i have ever seen a ufo.  i was driving at night on interstate 74/280 in between coal valley and the 74/80 interchange in the illinois side.  it was a heavily wooded area on both sides of the interstate and there were no cars on the stretch of road besides me.  the first thing i noticed was what appeared to be stadium lights off behind the trees to one side and wondering how i didn't know there was a stadium over there, since i'd grown up in that area.  out of the corner of my eye i noticed that the 'stadium lights' disappeared behind taller trees for a little bit and then suddenly reappeared much closer than they had been initially, which caught my attention.  when i looked back, the lights were now coming over the interstate and i could make out the gigantic triangle shape (i'm talking football field size, at least).  it was moving very slowly (think blimp) and i couldn't hear any sound coming from it. engine and road noise may have covered a hum but there was no significant noise (i hear planes and helicopters over engine and road noise all the time).  it seems like there was 1 white light on each corner and 1 white light centered on each side and there seemed to be a 'mist' around it, or possibly it was entering clouds, but seemed to be much too low for that to be possible.  i cannot remember for sure it if was a partly cloudy night or not but i do remember determining its shape at one point by seeing the stars that it blocked as it passed in front of them.  i'm not sure of color but it had to be very dark.  it floated slowly over my truck until it disappeared behind the trees on the other side of the interstate.  something else to note, prior to this incident, if someone had told me this same story that i am now telling, i would have been sure they were nuts and never believed it.  i also cannot believe that i did not pull over and stop.  all i remember is leaning forward looking up at it (because by the time it was crossing the interstate it was basically directly above my truck) and feeling complete awe mixed with almost fear and general unease.  i just kept driving, asking myself over and over again in my head 'what was that?' and trying to rationalize it.  there is nothing to this day that i can think of that it could have been.  it was the most amazing crazy thing that has ever happened to me.
content.summary: Huge dark triangle shaped ufo with white lights

content.detailedDescription: Two orbs moving sw to ne rotating around each other  one central other orbits, then they switched but dont stop moving  move behind clouds
content.summary: Orbs

content.detailedDescription: Around 2:30pm i walked outside to smoke a cigarette and enjoy a cup of coffee. i was watching the beautiful clear skies when i saw what looked like two white objects moving around each other near the trees. they didn't seem to be that far away, and i didn't think much of it. i think they were just two pieces of paper floating around each other in the distance. the wind, however, was very calm. the objects then disappeared. ( i figured they had fallen to the ground. when the objects floated around each other, the spherical figure twisted as if the object was showing a thinner side - like if you turn a piece of white paper and the thin side is facing you. ) above the area where i spotted this activity around the tree line, high in the sky, two jets appear. (this is about 5 minutes after the first two objects disappeared). the two jets were flying perpendicular to one another, yet they weren't meeting one another at any point. i focused my attention on one of the jets, and watched the trail it left. this was a normal trail, one that dissipated into the air. strangely enough, a white orb appeared next to the trail. it looked as if it remained stationary, and the plane continued in it's normal path. did the plane drop a white sphere? i didn't see the sphere come out of the plane, and i didn't see the sphere come out of the trail. it just appeared next to the trail, and looked as if it were stationary. it disappeared with the trail. do airplanes drop white spheres that remain stationary? i would like some kind of explanation as to what it could be. the first two objects were probably trash, but spotting this orb appearing at a different location shortly after the first two disappeared has made me question whether or not the first two objects were really trash.
content.summary: Clear skies. saw 2 orb-like objects close to the horizon, right above the tree line. they moved around each other then disappeared. saw two jets going in opposite directions afterwards. as if dropped by one of the jets, an orb appeared near the trail.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home after dark, 1 to 1 and a half miles from home towards the west.  noticed bright light in the western sky thought it was a falling star and realized it was moving and getting larger.  it stopped ahead of me and fell down to tree level and hovered with different colored lights.  it was cloudy around the object, the lights were bright with lights around the edges blinking from right to left with no pattern.  stopped vehicle and got out to look, called wife, then tried to take picture with cell phone.  approximately 4 mins, then it went to the south and then north east and was gone fast.  got back in vehicle and continued to drive home.  was about a quarter mile or less from home and saw it again in the west again, and was hovering over a field.  called wife again and talked while watching it.  lasted a couple minutes, and it disappeared.  continued driving home, pulled in driveway and as i was coming up driveway over trees behind home.  it didn't hover, was moving slowly then streaked away to the north west.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed object 3 times while driving home after dark

content.detailedDescription:
About 2 months ago i got my binoculars out to look closer at a couple of really bright stars/planets that seem to "flicker" different colors.
i then noticed star-like, star-colored objects that would fly super fast across the sky above me. usually they can be seen without my binoculars when they are brightly and solidly "lit" up. sometimes when i'm tracking a brightly lit object with my binoculars, i can see dimmer ones flying by the brighter ones. this has had me mesmerized every night there are no clouds. i'm obsessed with finding out what these objects are! due to it being winter-time and cold outside, my husband will not "watch" these objects with me, so no-one else in my home has been a witness to all of this yet. the objects that i have witnessed have only followed a straight-lined path, not gone in circles or changed direction. however, sometimes i will see a "flash" of light (that is not a star twinkling) and then the moving star-like object will appear in my view. i've never in my life seen anything like this! last night i was waiting for the "show" to start, like every night...It was around 6 pm, central time, and had just gotten dark enough for most of the stars to shine pretty brightly. i saw one of the objects coming--it seemed to be brighter than usual--put the binoculars up to my eyes and it seemed to "pulsate" every few seconds to a reddish-orange color. not like an airplanes lights blink, this was like it had a light all the way around it, and the light was reddish orange. more orange than red, though. and it was bright!  i was awestruck and stunned to witness this. usually the ones i see are just a constant "white" color. i tracked it with my binoculars until it finally flew out of my sight. i wish i had a telescope to maybe see these things better, but have not been able to afford to buy one yet. my husband was not home, or i would've yelled for him to come out and see this one for sure.  i waited a while outside for that one to appear again, but never did. just the usual solid white ones came and went. i had to go inside because my hands and feet were starting to freeze. after about an hour or so i went back out. this time i saw what started out to be a solid white one, but then it started to "pulsate" to a brighter white. and when it got brighter, it was very bright, and seemed to be a "bigger" light source than when it stays solid??? it's hard to describe. it wouldn't stay brighter for very long, it would go back to normal and wait a few seconds to "pulsate". i watched it until it flew out of my sight. i just want to know what these are! i do believe there are ufo's and other paranormal things going on in this world. i'm very interested in investigating this further, but don't know how to go about doing it. especially without a telescope. will a telescope help me to see this fast flying things better? i don't know, but i wanted to report these sightings to someone who may know more about it. has anyone else reported seeing this sort of thing? i have not attempted to video-tape anything or take photos since they are so high up in the sky, but i may try to tonight if there are no clouds.
content.summary: Observations of several star-like ufo's flying fast and high above my home for the past 2 months. sometimes solid white, sometimes they seem to brighten whiter or pulsate with red-orange colors.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving near studewood park, and glanced up and seen a huge triage shape object in the air.  it was up in the air like 50 ft away from me.  it just sat still in the air.  you could see smoke from the two ends of the triangle in the bottom..  i never believed in ufo, but i know that it had to be one...
content.summary: Triangle shape object in houston,  tx

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was in my sunroom
2.  i notice these objects around 6:40 to 10:30 pm at night
3. these objects slowly hover above the city, not following the sideral path of the stars.
4.  these objects flicker and change shape, but amazingly, no one takes a look above them in windsor to notice.
5. no feelings except curiosity.
6.  these objects disappear around 10:30 at night, but sometimes show up again in the morning.
content.summary: Series of different ufos which light up at different times.

content.detailedDescription:
After arriving home from dinner late night with my friend, we happened to look up into the sky while still in the parking lot in montego bay apartments, we both witnessed a black triangular craft that was silently and very slowly gliding through the sky at low enough altitudes that, if i were a kid with a sling shot i could have easily hit the craft with a rock.
the craft was approximately 80ft long on each side and appeared to have a matte or satin black coating on its surface, it also seemed to have smaller circular outlines on each corner on the bottom of the craft, making a total of three circular outlines about the size of a tire, and on the left and right side of the craft there appeared to be ventilation shafts, one square shaft on each side about 5'x5' in size, and this is assuming from the direction of travel that these are the left and right side of the craft.
this craft had no apparent light emitting from its surface, as if it had turned whatever lights it had off in order to not draw any attention to its self, like a usaf stealth bomber, except this craft had absolutely no markings on it whats so ever to identify it, and this is from the bottom view of it obviously. no noise or any type of sound was made or heard from this craft, it moved completely and surprisingly silent, not even the type of wind turbulence that you would hear from cars driving fast or airplanes landing was heard, although the ambience around the neighborhood seemed to quiet down while it passed overhead, almost as if it was somehow pushing the air out of the way, then gently placing the air back after it passed by, giving you the feeling that it was never really there, even a paper airplane could have made more noise than this craft.
the craft was traveling at about 20mph from ne to sw over the apartment complex, which is an oddly slow speed for such a big craft to be traveling, which obviously was not using lift to fly like a conventional airplane, especially at an altitude of under 150ft, but this was only while we witnessed it, which was less than a mile or about half a minute. i waved bye to the craft while it flew away into the night...
content.summary: Black triangle ufo, 80ft wide, gliding at about 15mph under 100ft altitude...

content.detailedDescription: Was going eastward on my way home and i always pay attention to the sky at nite as,i once saw a black triangle to the  east of the sky several years ago; and in that particular side of the sky there is always some helicopter activity due to the  freeway or  crimes in the area.I noticed that one "starlike  white light or helicopter was approaching the other '" white starlike" object, and then suddenly the starlike object that was stationary took off with amazing speed and ascent, and the  second white light or helicopter in pursuit ,but it could'nt catch up with the other bright light and then it disappeared into the sky.I waited to see if the local news had any reports ,but i did'nt hear any news at all about this incident,and i did'nt report it to any authorities as i don't think they would take me seriously.This wa so amazing and scary,i've never seen anything take off so fast ,like it knew it was being found out.And this was pretty high in the sky as both objects resembled stars.
content.summary: Possible helicopter or plane chasing  a u.F.O.?

content.detailedDescription: This happened the summer 08 i was going to see my girlfriend. as i was almost in carolina community i look out to my left an saw a trangle aircraft flying very slow it was about 7:30pm it was geting dark but was still daylight anyway i got a good look at it. it was a trangle ~ wedge with 3 white bright lights on each corner an small red blinking light in the center an was silver not black like others ive been reading about flying at the hight of about 2 an half power poles. i was watchig it as i was driving it crossed the road right over my car it was dangerous but as it did i had my head out the window looking up at. as i came to the little store i had to turn at it was going the same direction as this road but a little to the left i lost sight of it behind the trees it was at a higher altitude now than when it came over me. an this is when i seen that it was more of a wedge with two white lights on the back. i just really want to know what i saw. its all true. happened in alabama right outside andalusia.
content.summary: Trangle aircraft  but  it was thick like a wedge 3 white bright lights 1 small red flashing in the center on the bottom,  2 big white lights on the back

content.detailedDescription: 6-8 glowing amber lights hovering in the sky for 5 minutes. erratic movements. then they vanished
content.summary: Amber colored objects changing direcions .

content.detailedDescription: Was driving home from work abour 8 pm on 01/28/2012. usually get off on beach exit but saw strange disc shaped object with unusual lights and got off on knot exit. at garden grove street, object was high to the right side so i ulled in parking lot to try to get picture. had one bright red light and then white lights that were flashing in a pattered way around the disc. tried to get a closer look by taking another street but object was gone. i arrived close to home about 25 minutes later and saw object reappear in area above 22 freeway again. it was hovering and heading west. the white lights would go off and then reappear in a pattern again, turn brighter and then off and then object left very quickly.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering discliek object above 22 fwy in westminster/ garden grove ca

content.detailedDescription:
It was 5:30 am on jan. 4, 2012, after locking the front door my attention was drawn to the sky over my neighbors house... i noticed an object traveling at a very high rate of speed... it caught my interest because of its lighting was bright and constant... it didn't dissipate or disappear like a shooting star would have done. 

although there is an airport in the area, when airplanes begin their dissent their speed slows down considerably, this did not happen at all... the object travelled across the sky with what seemed to be a small trail.

the object was shaped like a white cigar with a brown band around the middle. it was a clear morning, star lit and no clouds at all in the sky. the object travelled well above the tree line as far as i could see...

the object is unexplainable....
content.summary: An unidenified object travelled across the sky at a very high rate of speed, 5:30 am on jan. 4, 2012

content.detailedDescription: Orb with pulsating mosaic colors.
content.summary: Nightly occurance. at first i thought it was vevus. it moves to quick for a planet. high powered. binoculars reveal a pulsating object with a mosaic pattrrn of pulsating colors.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my vehicle driving east on state rt. 531, (lake road) in north kingsville, 500 ft east of st. rt. 193.  i noticed a circle of lights in the sky and when i looked at it, it immediately darted to the north.  it was a circle of approximately 8 white lights.  

i am aware that the days inn of conneaut had a search light in operation for a special event.  i considered that the search light was what i saw, but i later felt it was not.  perhaps others saw the same.
content.summary: Was driving and saw circle of lights in windshield.  looked up and it shot to north over lake erie.

content.detailedDescription: I was with a friend driving on the 22 west freeway in garden grove, ca. it was about 7:00 on a saturday and we were heading to a friends house. i first noticed the object because it was very bright and appeared much larger than an airplane. the object slowly moved from the south to the north, then it started going from the north to the south, all the way across the sky. it was disk-shaped and had white a band of lights that seemed to be spinning around the outside edge of the object, and had 1 stationary red light on top. the object would rotate as it was moving and you could see the band of light going sideways at times. after it moved across the sky it ended being very low and the formation of lights that looked like a band in the sky actually seemed to spell something out in lights. it wasn't english writing that i could read but it looked like some kind of encryption. i almost thought maybe it could have been a blimp... but it moved far too fast and changed its flight path in the sky. i lost sight of the object because we were driving away from it on the freeway.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Disk shaped ufo over 22w freeway/brookhurst

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from a new years party. i was designated driver. i had just passed the 315/270 interchange driving on 315 north. i looked up in the sky to look at the stars while sitting at a light. i looked out the window to my left and noticed a fire in the sky. i could clearly see the flames. the object didnt move in any direction just hovered in the sky. at first i thought it was a plane on fire or a meteor, but the fact that it didnt move in any direction made me wonder why it wasnt falling. i showed the fire to my passenger who also describe it as a fire just kind of hovering there. i started driving when the light change to green and kept obvserving it until i was too far away and some trees obscured my view. the object just hung there for at least 5 - 6 minutes that i could track. 

for some reason i cannot get this image out of my mind. i would like to know if it was a plane on fire, or a meteor or something else. do you know of anyone else that might have witnessed this? do you know of where i can find out if this was a plane? 

this is not the first time i have seen strange lights, just the first time i have reported it. if you have any questions, please feel free to contact me.
content.summary: Saw a hovering fire in the sky that didnt move

content.detailedDescription:
i was at my brothers house in acapulco with a cousine,we had come from chile were we live.We were talking besides the pool on jan 16 2012,many stars and the sky was lit only by the moon. when                                       
i was watching towards venus when suddendly we saw(my couisin and i)a cloud form come tumbling down from the sky.     it was only seconds when we saw it being or becoming a huge triangler shape ufo.It passed over our heads very very low,so low that we could see the bottom of the ufos cell like forms on the surface of the object.It passed  about 20k.M and went over the house were we lost sight of it. after about 3 minutes it came from the other direction and passed a little more faster from east to west,durning southwest.It was utter amezment and a sence of joy.So mucho so that we laught and called it back because we wanted to see more of it.
content.summary: A triangle shape object,grey-metalic with cell form patterns at the bottom of the object.It made no noise,

content.detailedDescription: Was out on the deck facing north taking on the phone looking out over the trees and sighted over victoria, heading straight across the sky with a slight decent.  thought it might have been a comet or asteroid, but the direction seemed wrong as it appeared to be heading almost straight across the sky. the entire object was the shape of a cigar with a glowing red nose like a fireball and then a smokey short tail, about 5 x the size of a jet that if one had been in the same area and it was moving slower.  if i was to estimate i saw it for at least 1 minute before it disappeared, it could have just gone behind the trees but i moved around the house to see if i could spot it again, but to no avail.
content.summary: Cigar like with bright glowing red nose like a fireball and smokey short tail could have been a comet, but heading with a slight decent across the sky line, slower than a jet and then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Outside smoking cigarette on friday evening i was watching two planes/jets flying south to north, when a bright white pulsating light suddenly appeared and shot from west to east. at first i thought it was a shooting star but it didn't burn out. the light continued east leaving no contrail and disaapeared in about 45 seconds. i feel this could not have been a plane or jet because there were a few planes/jets in the area and i could clearly see the differnce between those and this object. this object was moving much faster than anything i have ever observed in the sky short of a shooting star or shuttle/rocket launch and made no sound.
content.summary: Pulsating light going west to east very fast

content.detailedDescription: Exact location as address can not be found via google.  38 02' 43.52"n 94 26'51.13"w at 911' elevation.  it was already dark out, and i was outside performing a chore that i had to wait on.  i was listening to a recording on my phone/mp3 player and was just observing the sky in front of me.  just a few degrees above my virtual horizon (a tree line 1.43 miles away at an altitude of 863").  i observed a light appear then disappear.  it did not move in any direction.  it was just there for about a second and then it was not.  i am very familiar with this horizon, and knew that this was out of place.  i had already observed aircraft flying in and out of this area and this was nothing like that.  it did not come into this area of the sky, it just appeared.  for over an hour i observed, in an approximate heading of 75.64 degrees and at a very good distance, this object appear for no longer than two seconds then disappear.  i witnessed this over a dozen times.  each time it appeared at varying heights and locations with varying intensity.  it was red on top and white on the bottom. all occurring within a small window of the sky.  the closest known thing i could equate it to was fireworks in the distance.  it would have had to have been the exact same firework fired off each time.  my wife observed this object twice independently and once with me. after doing a bit of research i learned that at my altitude the full horizon spans nearly 70 miles.  depending upon the objects altitude it could have been even further away.  at no time were either of us disturbed, or uncomfortable about what we were seeing.
content.summary: Orb:  red on top, white on the bottom

content.detailedDescription: My girl friend and me were in the mountains just out side of ukiah oregon on some old logging road camping out for the weekend.I was standing by my car loohing up at ths stars and how bright thay seem to be that night. i notice this one star it seemed to dwarf evething else in the sky it was much to big.I was thinking that it might be a communication satellite. i was looking between two pine trees kind of like a goal post.I watched it for about 10 min and it hadnt changed position and was not moveing with the staes. that when this bright light tock off like a bat out of hell this thing was moving so fast that it looked like a tracer across the sky then just disappear.Then it shows up just off to my left like someone had turned a bright light on. it stayed stationary for about 5 min then just like the first time it started all again first tracer then disappared.Then poped back up in the same place i had seen it the first time. i watched this light do this for about 20min back and forth right to left.I to my girl friend to come and check this out.I told her to look between these two pine trees at that bright light up there.Just i said that it took off i said look over there as i pointed it will show up over. she gave me this look i told her ive been watching this for 20 min it just keeps going back forth. then from out of nowhere one more shows up. so now theres one on are right side and one to the left.That when thay started putting on a show.For 10 min thay started crisscring thats my lady started packing everthing up so we could the hell out of there it freaked her out that much.About two weeks later iwas talking to a friend i told him what we  seen. he started telling me that hed seen the same thing and new smoe other people that seen this thing.Around the same place back up behind ukiah.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: A bright light that move so fast it left a tracer then disappear then reappear this went on for 20 min then one more show up

content.detailedDescription:
Around the first week of december 2010, my wife and i were heading home from bangor when the radio got real stat-icy. as i leaned forward to adjust the channel, commenting to my wife that it was strange, an object caught my eye over the treeline. i said to my wife "look!!" and she said "what the f**k!!""
 i slowed the jeep to a crawl, fascinated.
what we saw was a pie shaped "object" traveling from west to east, right above the treeline. it was very close, about 500ft from us, maybe 75-100ft above the trees....And it was big. as it crossed in front of us, the "front tip of it would be on one side of the road over the tree line while the "back" was still over the treeline on the other side of the road.

 it was a dull grey in color with lights shining on the underside. i could see the underside front, side and back as it passed. there were no lights on the side or back. there were some sort of... "protrusions"...On the sides and back(kind of like you'd see on a ship), and had what appeared to be barnicals the size of 5 gallon buckets and kelp hanging off the back.

it was moving so friggin slow, i thought how the hell is that thing in the air?? there was no sound from it, no exhaust,there was no disturbance of the vegetation as it passed over it...No trees swaying, anything like that.

all i could think was that thing had been under water for a long time.

as it passed over the eastern treeline i sped up the jeep hoping to regain another sight advantage point, but it was just...Gone. the radio came back in clear and that was it.

i can't tell anyone what it was but i certainly tell them what it wasn't.
it wasn't a plane, helicopter,kite,balloon,rocket,cloud,sunspot,boat none of that.

i am a practical man and that incident changed the way i think of ufo.
i would love to go under hypnosis and recount the incident.
content.summary: A pie shaped object crossing rd tree top high

content.detailedDescription:
i was taking pictures of the moon and venus,  the sky was very  clear, my surprise was when i saw the picture on the camera.
appears  a big  blue objet in the picture.
i took 4 pictures and the object appears in  two with different position.
the area is full of chemical plants.
content.summary: a blue  object appears in a picture.

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and i were talking in front of the house, when looking up towards the dome of the vatican city we saw a flying object that at first glance seems to assert the good year blimp was flying over that in those years in rome. i became aware that he was not sustained. he was a cigar-shaped object is dark gray above the town still exactly the vatican. his sizes was presumably double the church of st. peter. we flats at a distance of about 7 kilometers from the vatican. he continued to sit still at an altitude of 500/600 meters from the ground alleged no windows and no lights were visible.
the day was clear and there was about 2 minutes foschia.Trascorsi the object begins to move slowly south, then with a frightening acceleration, rising by a sharp bend on the left disappearing on the horizon.
this acceleration was to make me understand that it could be a flying object on earth. me and my mother in the face quard stunned and we wondered what it was. i was pervaded by a quiet and without certainty, glad i had the evidence that other non-terrestrial civilizations certainly exist. although, now, many years passed, from happening, the memory is sharp.
content.summary: Cigar stationary on vatican city for 2 minutes then great acceleration with rising curve on the left
